title: Jimmy G Staying Put In San Fran
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Crew discuss Jimmy G's re-signing to the 49ers as Trey Lance's back-up, Jerry Jones' quotes on why he believes the Cowboys shouldn't forget last season, and Bruce Arian's belief that this year's Buccaneers team is better than the Super Bowl champ team.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Jimmy G Staying in San Fran, Bruce Arians Bets on Bucs
